means: youth effectiveness training 青年有效培训

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连词或副词均含"但是，可是，然而，而"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: but, however, still, yet, nevertheless, while, whereas
means: but ： 口语常用词，语气较强，泛指与前述情况相反。
however ： 表转折关系，语气稍弱于but，连接性也弱一些，因而常作插入语。
still ： 语气强，多用于肯定句或疑问句。指尽管作出让步，采取措施或表示反对，但情况仍然如故，无所改变。
yet ： 常用于否定句，语气比still稍强。指不管作出多大努力或让步，仍达不到预期的结果。
nevertheless ： 指尽管作出完全让步，也不会发生任何影响。
while ： 表对比，一般可与whereas换用，但程度弱一些。
whereas ： 表对比，一般可与while互换。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个副词均含有"仍，还"之意。
means: still ： 指过去已经开始的动作，说话时仍在继续，可用于肯定、否定或疑问句中。
yet ： 通常用于疑问句和否定句中，指预料要发生的事，但尚未发生。

sentence.Network_en: "Have they been to visit you yet?" — "Just the once, yeah."
sentence.Network_cn: “他们来看过你吗?”——“来过,就一次.”

sentence.Network_en: The worst of the storm is yet to come.
sentence.Network_cn: 最猛烈的暴风雨就要来了。

sentence.Network_en: Life has not yet returned to normal but we are getting there.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活还没有恢复正常，不过就快了。

jx.jx_en_mean: Up to the present time; up to now.

means.word_mean: 仍然,不管怎样,无论如何,但是,另一方面

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English gīt(a), of unknown origin

entry.tran: （用于否定句中表示某事尚未发生但有可能发生，在疑问句中用来询问某事是否已发生。英国英语中，表示此义时通常不与一般过去时连用）尚（未），还，仍
entry.def: You use yet in negative statements to indicate that something has not happened up to the present time, although it probably will happen. You can also use yet in questions to ask if something has happened up to the present time. In British English the simple past tense is not normally used with this meaning of 'yet'.

example.ex: They haven't finished yet...
example.tran: 他们还没有完成。

example.ex: No decision has yet been made...
example.tran: 尚未作出决定。

entry.tran: （与谈论过去的否定句连用，表示当时并非如此）还，尚（未）
entry.def: You use yet with a negative statement when you are talking about the past, to report something that was not the case then, although it became the case later.

example.ex: There was so much that Sam didn't know yet...
example.tran: 还有很多是萨姆当时不知道的。

example.ex: He had asked around and learned that Billy was not yet here.
example.tran: 他四处询问，得知比利还没到这儿。

entry.tran: （用于否定句，表示某事以后会做但现在不该或不能做）还，尚
entry.def: If you say that something should not or cannot be done yet, you mean that it should not or cannot be done now, although it will have to be done at a later time.

example.ex: Don't get up yet...
example.tran: 先不要起床。

example.ex: The hostages cannot go home just yet...
example.tran: 人质目前还不能回家。

entry.tran: （用于最高级后，表示到目前为止最差或最好）迄今为止，到目前为止
entry.def: You use yet after a superlative to indicate, for example, that something is the worst or the best of its kind up to the present time.

example.ex: This is the BBC's worst idea yet...
example.tran: 这是到目前为止英国广播公司的最糟糕的点子。

example.ex: Her latest novel is her best yet.
example.tran: 她的最新小说是她迄今为止最好的一部。

entry.tran: （用于表示仍有可能）还是，仍然
entry.def: You can use yet to say that there is still a possibility that something will happen.

example.ex: Like the best stories, this one  may yet have a happy end...
example.tran: 就像最精彩的故事那样，这个故事也许仍会有个美好的结局。

example.ex: A negotiated settlement might yet be possible.
example.tran: 也许仍有可能通过磋商达成协议。

entry.tran: （用于表示一段时间的表达后，表示时间的延续）还要，还
entry.def: You can use yet after expressions which refer to a period of time, when you want to say how much longer a situation will continue for.

example.ex: Unemployment will go on rising for some time yet...
example.tran: 失业人数在一段时间内还将上升。

example.ex: Nothing will happen for a few years yet...
example.tran: 几年内还不会有什么事发生。

entry.tran: （表示从未做过某事，尤指惊人的事或坏事）还未，尚未
entry.def: If you say that you have yet to do something, you mean that you have never done it, especially when this is surprising or bad.

example.ex: She has yet to spend a Christmas with her husband...
example.tran: 她还从没和她的丈夫一起过过圣诞节。

example.ex: He has been nominated three times for the Oscar but has yet to win.
example.tran: 他已经3次获奥斯卡提名，但从未获奖。

entry.tran: （用于引出颇令人惊讶的事实）可是却，却又
entry.def: You can use yet to introduce a fact which is rather surprising after the previous fact you have just mentioned.

example.ex: I don't eat much, yet I am a size 16...
example.tran: 我吃得并不多，但是却穿16码的衣服。

example.ex: They were terrified James would die — yet there were moments when they almost wished he would...
example.tran: 他们很害怕詹姆斯会死——然而，有那么几个瞬间，他们几乎是希望他会死。

entry.tran: （用于强调，尤指相对于以前同类事物更为极端等）还要，甚至，更
entry.def: You can use yet to emphasize a word, especially when you are saying that something is surprising because it is more extreme than previous things of its kind, or a further case of them.

example.ex: Yet bigger satellites will be sent up into orbit...
example.tran: 更为大型的卫星将被送入轨道。

example.ex: I saw yet another doctor...
example.tran: 我又看了一个医生。

entry.tran: （用于否定句）迄今为止，目前为止
entry.def: You use as yet with negative statements to describe a situation that has existed up until the present time.

example.ex: As yet it is not known whether the crash was the result of an accident...
example.tran: 目前尚不清楚撞车是否是由事故引起的。

example.ex: We have not as yet received a response.
example.tran: 我们还未收到回复。

sentences.sentence: "I have yet to see the results"
"details are yet to be worked out"

means.word_mean: 2. used in negative statement to describe a situation that has existed up to this point or up to the present time;
3. to a greater degree or extent; used with comparisons;
4. within an indefinite time or at an unspecified future time;

sentences.sentence: "he longed for the flowers that were yet to show themselves"
"sooner or later you will have to face the facts"
"in time they came to accept the harsh reality"

means.word_mean: 6. despite anything to the contrary (usually following a concession);

sentences.sentence: "although I'm a little afraid, however I'd like to try it"
"while we disliked each other, nevertheless we agreed"
"he was a stern yet fair master"
"granted that it is dangerous, all the same I still want to go"

auth_sentence.content: It feels timeless, yet very of the moment.
auth_sentence.res_content: It feels timeless, yet very of the moment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It feels timeless, yet very of the moment.

auth_sentence.content: Yet The Undertones were always likeable and rarely boring.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet The Undertones were always likeable and rarely boring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet The Undertones were always likeable and rarely boring.

auth_sentence.content: 'Editors must resign' Yet changes are already visible.
auth_sentence.res_content: 'Editors must resign' Yet changes are already visible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'Editors must resign' Yet changes are already visible.

Sentence.sentence: Most of us know what we're doing and yet we do it anyway.
They will include plenty of names no one has yet heard of
She has not seen a doctor yet.

sentences.en: The job is not yet finished.
He said he hadn't received a letter from her yet.
sentences.cn: 他说他至今尚未收到她的信。

sentences.en: The poor girl loves him yet.
sentences.cn: 那可怜的姑娘现在依然爱着他。

sentences.en: Go at once while there is yet time.
sentences.cn: 趁着还有时间, 马上去。

sentences.en: I have yet to find out the truth.
Ah, so you've bought new slippers yet!
sentences.cn: 啊, 所以你还买了新拖鞋！

sentences.en: Have the children come home yet?
This is the biggest underground lake yet discovered.
sentences.cn: 这是迄今为止所发现的最大地下湖。

sentences.en: He may surprise us all yet.
sentences.cn: 他总有一天会让我们大家感到惊奇的。

sentences.en: The most severe weather is yet to come.
sentences.cn: 最冷的天气还在后头呢。

sentences.en: She's a funny girl, yet you can't help liking her.
sentences.cn: 她很滑稽, 但你禁不住会喜欢她。

sentences.en: The boy is so fat and yet he runs very fast.
sentences.cn: 这男孩很胖, 但却跑得很快。

sentences.en: He is very old, yet he is quite strong.
sentences.cn: 他虽然年纪很大了, 但还很强壮。

sentences.en: I agree with you, but yet I can't consent.
sentences.cn: 我同意你的意见, 但是我不能答应。

sentences.en: He lives alone, yet he is happy.
sentences.cn: 他虽然独自生活, 但却很愉快。

jushi.english: He may surprise us all yet.
jushi.chinese: 他总有一天会让我们大家感到惊奇的。

jushi.english: He said he hadn't received a letter from her yet.
jushi.chinese: 他说他至今尚未收到她的信。

jushi.english: Ah, so you've bought new slippers yet!
jushi.chinese: 啊,所以你还买了新拖鞋!
